issue.title: [C++][Datasets] Improve memory usage of datasets
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15411](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15411). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a parent issue to track a number of issues related to improving the runtime memory requirements of a dataset scan.
